title: Stay Thirsty | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Stay Thirsty | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to see favor, you have to stay thirsty for the dreams God put in your heart. You may not see it yet, but what He promised is going to come to pass. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
